import { memo, useState, useContext } from 'react' import './ProfileLayout.scss' import EditProfileIcon from '../../images/editUser.png' import HistoryBookingIcon from '../../images/bookingHistory.png' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/ProfileLayout' import EditProfile from '../../pages/EditProfile' import HistoryBookingCustomer from '../../pages/HistoryBookingCustomer' import { StickyContainer, Sticky } from 'react-sticky'; function ProfileLayout({ languageSelected }) { const menu = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese const [customer, setCustomer] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', birthDate: '', gender: '', address: '', city: '', phone: '', email: '' }) const [listBooking, setListBooking] = useState([ { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-12-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 0, status: 0, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-12-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 0, status: 1, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-01', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 0, status: 1, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-01', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 0, status: 2, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-12-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 1, status: 1, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-01', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 1, status: 1, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-01', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 1, status: 2, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-12-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 2, status: 0, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 2, status: 0, price: 100000, statusDeposit: false }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 2, status: 0, price: 100000, statusDeposit: true }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-12-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 2, status: 0, price: 100000, statusDeposit: true }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-01-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 2, status: 1, price: 100000, statusDeposit: true }, { bookingId: 1, tourId: 1, tourName: 'Tour avbc', startDate: '2022-12-20', numberOfAdult: 2, numberOfChildren: 1, tourType: 2, status: 2, price: 100000, statusDeposit: true }, ]) const [option, setOption] = useState(0) return (
{({ style }) => (
setOption(0)} className={`w-100 option-menu-profile mb-20 ${option === 0 && 'option-menu-profile-selected'}`}>
setOption(1)} className={`w-100 option-menu-profile mb-20 ${option === 1 && 'option-menu-profile-selected'}`}>
)}
{option === 0 ? : }
) } export default memo(ProfileLayout)
